===Dialogue Set #1===
:'''Moo:''' (A confused-looking young Koholasaur. There must be many questions it'd like to ask.)

===Dialogue Set #2===
;(Talk to Moo while indwelling a [[Saurian]])
:'''Moo:''' Just what the heck is [[Melusine|that]]!?
:'''Moo:''' [[Manaia|She]]'s not a Saurian like us, she can breathe underwater, and she has two stubby horns.
:'''Moo:''' She's also wearing clothes, and can speak the language of humans.
:'''Moo:''' ...She also won't let me drink the hot spring water! But whyyyyyy!?
{{Dialogue End}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{W|Moʻo}} are shapeshifting lizard spirits in {{W|Hawaiian mythology}}. "Moʻo" is also a general Hawaiian word for all kinds of reptiles.
